title: Contact Lookup Events
summary: A widget that shows upcoming contact events with Android Wear notifications.
developerAddress:
SoftWyer Ltd.
P.O. Box 2394
Swindon
UK
description: The default Android events are Birthdays and Anniversaries, but you can also create custom events with unique names.Features:+ Shows all events for contacts.+ Events in the next 7 days are shown on Android Wear devices.+ Events are shown date ordered, in grouped sections.+ Click the event to show the Quick Contact Badge.+ Exclude contacts by adding them to a group named 'CLE Hidden'+ Add the widget to the 'lock' screenAndroid Wear is supported for event notifications. Any event that happens within the next 7 days will be shown on the Android Wear device. Note that the Widget must be placed the home screen of the device that is linked to Android Wear.
descriptionHTML:
The default Android events are Birthdays and Anniversaries, but you can also create custom events with unique names.

Features:

+ Shows all events for contacts.
+ Events in the next 7 days are shown on Android Wear devices.
+ Events are shown date ordered, in grouped sections.
+ Click the event to show the Quick Contact Badge.
+ Exclude contacts by adding them to a group named 'CLE Hidden'
+ Add the widget to the 'lock' screen

Android Wear is supported for event notifications. Any event that happens within the next 7 days will be shown on the Android Wear device. Note that the Widget must be placed the home screen of the device that is linked to Android Wear.
recentChanges: + Support for showing notifications on Android Wear devices. Now via a separate wear app to avoid lollipop issues.
+ Should handle large contact photos better.
Check our Google+ site for more information https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/113750147836457488590/113750147836457488590/posts
